articles.title: Afterpay and co have a reprieve but RBA decision comes with a warning - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The RBA didn’t rule out the prospect of reversing its decision on merchant surcharges somewhere down the track.
articles.content: BNPL players dont want a 4 to 6 per cent charge added to the price of goods and services just because the consumer chooses to pay using this instalment payment method. It would tilt the playing field… [+4435 chars]
